name: Quepland Fields
description: There is a small stream and a forest of white pine trees. A large poplar tree has been chopped and laid across the path. You'll need to chop through it to continue on the path.

name: Quepland Woods
description: You enter a thick woods consisting of mostly poplar trees. The path meanders up the mountain along a brook full of sunfish. In the distance you can see the smokestacks of a small village.

name: Teppas
description: You reach a small mountain village, small houses and shops are scattered about inside a short stone wall. A massive mansion spans most of the far wall; a windy street continues through the hilly terrain.

buildings.name: Mayor's House
buildings.description: You enter a lavish mansion. A large chandelier hangs over a magnificent curved staircase to the second floor. The carpet near the entrance is faded and worn.

name: Lower Mt Queple Trail
description: Beyond the village you find a rocky terrain, sparse with trees or wildlife.  You spot a rocky overhang that appears to cover a cave entrance. There is a small shack with a sign on the top that reads, "Signs"

buildings.name: Sign Man's Signs
buildings.description: You enter the dimly lit shack to find a thin, gray-bearded man sitting behind a desk with the words "Sign Man" drawn in large red letters across it.

name: Upper Mt Queple Trail
description: High up on the mountain you can see down into the valley below. Beyond the hilly forest there appears to be a desert to the east, and a swamp to the west. The path only leads higher up the mountain.

name: Eastern Trail
description: The trail winds down into the woods below. The smell of the swamp ahead greets you before you can even see it.
